title: Update Payment Method
description: A customer's credit card on file has expired, and they need to update it for their recurring payments.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their current payment method.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer's account and sees the expired card on file.

tasks.description: Securely collect the new credit card information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the new card number, expiration date, and CVV.

tasks.description: Update the recurring payment plan with the new card details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the payment information.
